name: 格雷格·罗根
introduction: Gregg Rogen is an Actor & DJ/Music Producer from New York City, currently living in Los Angeles, CA.His film credits include: The Pitch, made by Tommy O' Haver & Entourage creator Doug Ellin; and co-starring David Schwimmer, and Ernie Hudson.  DJ Girl, an indie film soon to be released, Liar's Poker, co-starring Flea of the Red Hot Chili Peppers, Gringo Funk, a cool, new short in film festivals now.  Cries and Whispers, & Since You Went Away, two shorts which Rogen directed, edited and acted in (for a 36 hour film festival).  The Root, a dark short, written & directed and starring Rogen; currently in production.  Just One of the Gynos, & Good Luck in Her Eye, two comedic shorts which are getting noticed in several short film festivals.Rogen's television credits include: 90210, Columbo Goes to College (with Peter Falk), General Hospital, Days of our Lives, & California Dreams.
